CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 29 In the case of PQCDTB , the LUMO level ( -3.32 eV ) was higher than the PC71BM LUMO level ( -4.0 eV ) by 0.68 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PC71BM |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "PC71BM". These are the names of the materials being discussed in the context of their LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) levels.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PC71BM |

In this paragraph, the two clear "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "PC71BM". These are the only words in the paragraph that unambiguously refer to materials. The term "LUMO level" is not a material name, but rather a property of a material.

The other entity, "0.68 eV", is not a material property, but rather a value associated with the difference in LUMO levels.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 29 In the case of PQCDTB , the LUMO level ( -3.32 eV ) was higher than the PC71BM LUMO level ( -4.0 eV ) by 0.68 eV.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| -3.32 eV |
| -4.0 eV |
| 0.68 eV |

The three "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are "-3.32 eV", "-4.0 eV", and "0.68 eV". These are all numerical values with units of electron volts (eV) that describe the energy levels of certain materials.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |

The only clear "Value of material property" entities in the paragraph are "-3.32 eV", "-4.0 eV", and "0.68 eV". These are all numerical values with units of electron volts (eV) that describe the energy levels of certain materials. The term "PQCDTB" and "LUMO level" are not "Value of material property" entities, as they are names of materials and properties, respectively.
